articles.description: Most fund managers have been left on the sidelines amid their long-standing reticence around this segment. Barring a few exceptions, PSU entities remain underowned by mutual funds.
articles.content: After a long run in the wilderness, PSU stocks are currently the darlings of Dalal Street. The S&P BSE PSU index has gained nearly 100% over the past year, even as the S&P BSE Sensex climbed … [+4872 chars]

articles.title: Qualcomm set to double India investments: Executive - The Economic Times
articles.description: US semiconductor major Qualcomm is doubling down on investments in India, surpassing rivals AMD and Micron. The company plans to partner with chip manufacturers and develop a semiconductor ecosystem in India. It also aims to diversify into automotive, 5G, PC,…

articles.title: DLF to launch properties worth almost ₹80,000 crore over the next 3-4 years - Hindustan Times
articles.description: Most DLF projects to be in the luxury and ultra luxury segments. Delhi-NCR, Mumbai, Goa and Chennai would be the focus areas of the company
articles.content: Real estate major DLF plans to launch new properties spanning approximately 32 mn sq ft with a sales potential of almost 80,000 crores over the next 3-4 years in line with its plans of scaling up the… [+5154 chars]

articles.title: Qatar announces new gas output boost with mega field expansion - Al Jazeera English
articles.description: Overall expansion of North Field from 77mtpa currently to 142mtpa by 2030 represents 85 percent increase in production.
articles.content:
Qatar has announced new plans to expand output from the worlds biggest natural gas field, saying it will boost capacity to 142 million tonnes per annum (mtpa) before 2030.
